optimization.stochastic.algorithms

Interface OptimizationAlgorithmInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DifferentialEvolution, GABasicFitnessProportional, GABasicTSel, GAIslandModel, HillClimbing, HillClimbingLeap, PPPSO, SimulatedThermicAnnealing, SimulatedThermicAnnealingLeap

    public interface OptimizationAlgorithmInterface
    By convention, everything will be a MINIMIZATION problem. This means that if the natural fitness is not such, it needs to be changed so that it is smaller for better instances.
